setting.value:
We're very excited to announce the [B][COLOR white]launch of our new FreeTelly app[/COLOR][/B] - it's a custom version of Kodi that comes with everything preinstalled and ready for use!
Visit the Following Link to Download FreeTelly: [B][COLOR white]https://www.tvaddons.ag/freetelly-launch/[/COLOR][/B]
Don't Forget to Enter to [B][COLOR white]Win an NVIDIA SHIELD TV[/COLOR][/B]: [B][COLOR white]https://www.tvaddons.ag/freetelly-contest/[/COLOR][/B]
At this point, we'd like to thank you for your continuous support, and wish everyone a relaxing summer with lots of fun under the sun!
